tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: Weird Al - You're Pitiful
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: http://www.flashcartoons.org Weird Al's parody of James Blunt - Your Beautiful. We made our own flash cartoon about it. We are big fans of Weird Al and thought it was our duty! Enjoy!

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: I use this song to break up﻿ an argument in cod XD
or maybe he blinked﻿ exactly at the same time as you did :O
well i myself cant speak for him but me i am atheist﻿ and i would not give a shit if anyone dissed my belief
HALO LOL﻿

That would be a fucking great excuse for atheists "Evolution is just symbolic" xD And, that thought was 2 days, and a lot﻿ of stress ago, I can't remember my train of thought, I wish I had typed it up in a word doc :/
I meant that this is pretty much the "bronys" life's.﻿
pretty much nothing in this video﻿ describes me, other than the "you just cant dance" line >->
go to h﻿ land
Forever﻿ Alone
Those were the﻿ days weren't they
That they do, that they do. ^.^﻿
I didn't see Al blink once, that creeped me out more than anything in the video﻿ lol
This itheist of the﻿ "bronys" Ina nut-shell.
Because the﻿ internet doesn't have to make sense Da das Internet keinen Sinn zu machen

That would kinda defeat the point though. My point is anyway that you just can't disprove the existance of God, because he is supposed to be all-powerful, meaning he can do whatever the hell he wants and to hell with the laws of nature :P﻿ I don't believe personally but I accept that there is no rela evidence to say otherwise.
Why is there a religious argument on this﻿ video?
i love it﻿
also﻿ shower daily xD
with you on that,, ﻿
its the internet... nobody gives a flying fuck about your beliefs... get over yourself, what﻿ you think doesnt matter to anybody but you

In absolutly no way does that even begin to disprove god. Also we can't be 100% sure that event didn't occure, because we can;t even be 100% sure that one persons experence of existance is the same as anothers. Also it could have been symbolic...a metaphore. What's example 2?﻿
OBJECTION! i haven't played halo 2 in for-fucking ever. Also no one has ever in my life called me "Farty Pants"﻿ :|
Nutttttt jobbbbbbb﻿
oh damn :o﻿

Apparently James Blunt actually likes this song but his record label wouldn't let Weird Al release it. From what I gather James Blunt actually has a very good sense of humour, he just records shite music (something he himself﻿ often comments on, in a self-depricating way).
Good on you James Blunt (I never thought I'd say that). Pity about your label.

Reviewer.Location: roflmal topia-cheese cake land of the lols, GB
roflmal topia-cheese cake land of the lols, GB
